???
However, I am confused whether I have selected the right department for the aforementioned health problem. If not, visited doctor must direct me to visit concerned department.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor was not at all friendly. Did not explain about the medicines and future procedures. Did not even heard my problem in detail, seems like she is in some kind of hurry.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had very bad experience with dr. Geetu bhatia. I had gone there for the pregnancy checkup of my wife. She had constipation. Dr. Advised her to take issabgol. I asked her can she take lavan bhaskar churna (an aurvedic medicine), rather than advising Us she became very adament and aggressive. I was totally fadeup. When I asked her will she checkup or should we go back. Then she checked up my wife. She was looking at us very furiously. She called us beta although we are senior than her. Is she a grand grand amma?
A Dr. Must satisfy his patients politely and friendly rather than becoming aggressive like Dr. Geetu Bhatia.
I never like to visit her again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was not punctual .She asked me to come at 10:25 am and she herself turned up at10:50am ..I have to wait for 25 minutes and have to enquire 2 times at reception.She was rudely in her conduct ..she was really arrogant ..I asked her repeatedly please check me I have a problem but she constantly goes on denying me .she was really arrogant in her conduct and her words were"doctor mein ya tum" inspite of my request she just write 2 medicines *** ******* ****** ******** ***** *** *******she forcefully asked me to go...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She took money for ultrasound had not given report to my wife and suggested some surgery to my wife. **** * *** ********** *** **** ******** ** ********** ****** **** I consulted another gynaecologist. *** **** ***** ***** ********** ** ***** *** **** *** ***** ** ****** ****** *** ****** God bless Dr Geetu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I met Dr geetu one year back and I remember going in her chamber crying and coming out smiling. So when I was pregnant again there was no other doctor I could go to. She is a lovely doctor with loving nature she is patient and answers alk our doubts no matter how silly and never losses cool lik
E other doctor.. I recommend her to everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I regret to inform that this is 2nd time when I had taken treatment from Geetu Bhatia for my pregnancy treatment and both the times she rudely behaved with me, her way of talking with patients is not at all good, she should speak to patients politely which is much very much expected from a private hospital doctor, where we are spending lots of money for treatment.

review: My wife visited doctor. She was in pain and tried to know whats wrong with her. Doctor did USG but didnt mention clearly what happened to her. She only mentioned its a cyst and its very complicated. ****** ***** ** *** **** ******** **** *** **** **** **** **** ** *** ** ***** My wife really got panicked and cried after leavig the room. When i entered later she even not speak to me as she was getting late as time got over. She even didnt provided USG report to us. Really not expexcted from a doctor this kind of behavior. We have paid money to get service, she should carefully listen us and share about entire things how it can cure and what is the solution of the problem.

reply_text: Yep during pandemic instead of getting report you want to hand over phone to doctor, so they can get infected, and so course Accordingly to you no treatment was given to you, and yes I am being sarcastic. I do hope you find a "good" doctor who will touch your infected phone, good luck

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Really bad experience. Doctor is not friendly,she is arrogant. 

I used to go to this doctor from starting of my wife pregnancy for checkups. But she never reported any complications. 


All of a sudden in 9th month they reported some major health issues to baby. 

Currently me and wife going through a emotional phase in life.
reply_text: I mental health issue you are referring to is the ultrasound report showing abnormality, how is a doctor who is not ultrasound specialist supposed to know ,or are you suggesting that gynae should write you usg prescription every week. Even though i empathize with you for your problems how am i to blame or may be you are a type of person who blames everyone else for your problems except yourself
